name: Quiz Application
backend_requirements: Question model: id, question_text (required), options (JSON array), correct_answer (integer index)
POST /api/quiz/submit - accept answers array, return score and correct answers
frontend_requirements: Display one question at a time with radio buttons for options
'Next' button to proceed, 'Submit' on last question
Show score after submission with correct/incorrect indicators
Review mode showing all questions with correct answers
